item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning Note 1 - Playing Pong with Policy Gradient
item.description: This is my first post in this year and also my first post about machine learning. Formerly, I think I am gonna make this blog only for low-level and security playground only –that’s why the name is postmortem.
